TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed MatrixTransform3D extends System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3D
Public NotInheritable Class MatrixTransform3D Inherits Transform3D

Docs.summary: Creates a transformation specified by a , used to manipulate objects or coordinate systems in 3-D world space.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MatrixTransform3D>类，以创建不由提供的自定义转换<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.RotateTransform3D>， <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ScaleTransform3D>，或<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.TranslateTransform3D>类。
你可以组合<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3D>通过使用对象<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3DGroup>类。

Docs.summary: Creates a modifiable clone of this , and makes deep copies of this object's values. When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (although they might no longer resolve) but does not copy animations or their current values.

## Remarks 此方法用于生成的可修改副本冻结<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象。 为方便起见，此方法隐藏继承的版本使用的强类型实现。
有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

Docs.returns: A modifiable clone of the current object. The cloned object's property will be even if the source's property was .

Docs.value: 一个的表示形式 [！INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_3d](~/includes/tla2sharptla-3d-md.md)] 转换。

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MatrixTransform3D.Value%2A>属性继承自<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3D>类。 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MatrixTransform3D.Value%2A>属性使您能够将任何<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3D>对象插入<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D>对象。 因为<xref:System.Windows.Media.MatrixTransform>类定义使用 Matrix3D<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MatrixTransform3D.Matrix%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MatrixTransform3D.Value%2A>属性始终返回相同的值。 MatrixTransform3D 类公开<xref:System.Windows.Media.MatrixTransform.Matrix%2A>属性以启用写入访问。
## Examples [!code-csharp[matrixtransform3dview#MatrixTransform3DView3DN13](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/MatrixTransform3DView/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#matrixtransform3dview3dn13)] [!code-vb[matrixtransform3dview#MatrixTransform3DView3DN13](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/MatrixTransform3DView/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#matrixtransform3dview3dn13)]
